title: A multi-biocatalytic system for effective fumarate synthesis from pyruvate and gaseous CO2
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00486D, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mika Takeuchi, Yutaka Amao
Fumarate synthesis from gaseous CO2 and pyruvate in an aqueous medium using a multi-biocatalytic system consisting of pyruvate carboxylase, malate dehydrogenase and fumarase in the presence of ATP and NADH is developed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
